@htctouch: I found one copy only, but pretty bad. However htctouch you must be aware that Short cuts are long movie - 3h20m I think and they cannot be - small. It is like two normal movies in duration.
Even with my compression ShortCuts cannot be under 600 MB and copy I found has - 705 MB.
It is stupid to compress such file. Gain in size is  minimal and quality loss is always present. 
So, what I can do is to point you on Google, search for ...Short Cuts (1993) [DVDRip|x264|705MB]... and result will point you to one forum where you must follow instructions, become membership then download. 
Is this OK with you?
